mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_income_statement( security_code, report_date, date_type, stock_type, gross_revenue, operating_receipt, interest_revenue, premium_earned, commreve, other_revenue, gross_revenue_other, total_operating_cost, operating_cost, interest_exp, commission_exp, rd_exp, surrender_premium, net_indemnity_exp, net_contract_reserve, expenditures_dividend_policy, amortized_reinsurance_exp, other_exp, sales_tax, sales_exp, manage_exp, financial_exp, asset_value_loss, operating_cost_other, fair_value_income, investment_income, investment_join_income, exchange_income, operating_profit, non_business_revenue, non_current_asset_revenue, non_business_exp, non_current_asset_loss, operating_profit_other, operating_profit_balance, sum_profit, income_tax, sum_profit_other, sum_profit_balance, combined_net_profit, net_profit, parent_net_profit, minority_income, net_profit_after_loss, plus_net_profit_other, unconfirm_invest_loss, minus_net_profit_other, net_profit_balance, basic_eps, diluted_eps, oci, parent_company_oci, minority_shareholder_oci, sumci, parent_compay_ci, minority_shareholder_ci ) VALUES ( #{item.securityCode}, #{item.reportDate}, #{item.dateType}, #{item.stockType}, #{item.grossRevenue}, #{item.operatingReceipt}, #{item.interestRevenue}, #{item.premiumEarned}, #{item.commreve}, #{item.otherRevenue}, #{item.grossRevenueOther}, #{item.totalOperatingCost}, #{item.operatingCost}, #{item.interestExp}, #{item.commissionExp}, #{item.rdExp}, #{item.surrenderPremium}, #{item.netIndemnityExp}, #{item.netContractReserve}, #{item.expendituresDividendPolicy}, #{item.amortizedReinsuranceExp}, #{item.otherExp}, #{item.salesTax}, #{item.salesExp}, #{item.manageExp}, #{item.financialExp}, #{item.assetValueLoss}, #{item.operatingCostOther}, #{item.fairValueIncome}, #{item.investmentIncome}, #{item.investmentJoinIncome}, #{item.exchangeIncome}, #{item.operatingProfit}, #{item.nonBusinessRevenue}, #{item.nonCurrentAssetRevenue}, #{item.nonBusinessExp}, #{item.nonCurrentAssetLoss}, #{item.operatingProfitOther}, #{item.operatingProfitBalance}, #{item.sumProfit}, #{item.incomeTax}, #{item.sumProfitOther}, #{item.sumProfitBalance}, #{item.combinedNetProfit}, #{item.netProfit}, #{item.parentNetProfit}, #{item.minorityIncome}, #{item.netProfitAfterLoss}, #{item.plusNetProfitOther}, #{item.unconfirmInvestLoss}, #{item.minusNetProfitOther}, #{item.netProfitBalance}, #{item.basicEps}, #{item.dilutedEps}, #{item.oci}, #{item.parentCompanyOCI}, #{item.minorityShareholderOCI}, #{item.sumci}, #{item.parentCompayCI}, #{item.minorityShareholderCI} )ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE stock_type = VALUES(stock_type), gross_revenue = VALUES(gross_revenue), operating_receipt = VALUES(operating_receipt), interest_revenue = VALUES(interest_revenue), premium_earned = VALUES(premium_earned), commreve = VALUES(commreve), other_revenue = VALUES(other_revenue), gross_revenue_other = VALUES(gross_revenue_other), total_operating_cost = VALUES(total_operating_cost), operating_cost = VALUES(operating_cost), interest_exp = VALUES(interest_exp), commission_exp = VALUES(commission_exp), rd_exp = VALUES(rd_exp), surrender_premium = VALUES(surrender_premium), net_indemnity_exp = VALUES(net_indemnity_exp), net_contract_reserve = VALUES(net_contract_reserve), expenditures_dividend_policy = VALUES(expenditures_dividend_policy), amortized_reinsurance_exp = VALUES(amortized_reinsurance_exp), other_exp = VALUES(other_exp), sales_tax = VALUES(sales_tax), sales_exp = VALUES(sales_exp), manage_exp = VALUES(manage_exp), financial_exp = VALUES(financial_exp), asset_value_loss = VALUES(asset_value_loss), operating_cost_other = VALUES(operating_cost_other), fair_value_income = VALUES(fair_value_income), investment_income = VALUES(investment_income), investment_join_income = VALUES(investment_join_income), exchange_income = VALUES(exchange_income), operating_profit = VALUES(operating_profit), non_business_revenue = VALUES(non_business_revenue), non_current_asset_revenue = VALUES(non_current_asset_revenue), non_business_exp = VALUES(non_business_exp), non_current_asset_loss = VALUES(non_current_asset_loss), operating_profit_other = VALUES(operating_profit_other), operating_profit_balance = VALUES(operating_profit_balance), sum_profit = VALUES(sum_profit), income_tax = VALUES(income_tax), sum_profit_other = VALUES(sum_profit_other), sum_profit_balance = VALUES(sum_profit_balance), combined_net_profit = VALUES(combined_net_profit), net_profit = VALUES(net_profit), parent_net_profit = VALUES(parent_net_profit), minority_income = VALUES(minority_income), net_profit_after_loss = VALUES(net_profit_after_loss), plus_net_profit_other = VALUES(plus_net_profit_other), unconfirm_invest_loss = VALUES(unconfirm_invest_loss), minus_net_profit_other = VALUES(minus_net_profit_other), net_profit_balance = VALUES(net_profit_balance), basic_eps = VALUES(basic_eps), diluted_eps = VALUES(diluted_eps), oci = VALUES(oci), parent_company_oci = VALUES(parent_company_oci), minority_shareholder_oci = VALUES(minority_shareholder_oci), sumci = VALUES(sumci), parent_compay_ci = VALUES(parent_compay_ci), minority_shareholder_ci = VALUES(minority_shareholder_ci)
